title: Recommender - Enable the API
abstract:
# Recommender - Enable the API
# Enable the API
This page explains how to enable the Recommender API. Enabling the API is required in order to view and manage recommendations and insights using the [gcloud](/sdk/gcloud/reference/recommender) and [REST](/recommender/docs/reference/rest/v1/projects.locations.recommenders.recommendations) interfaces.
To enable the Recommender API:
- If you don't already have a Google Cloud project, [create one](/resource-manager/docs/creating-managing-projects#creating_a_project) now.
- Set the default project, where is the ID of your project:```
gcloud config set project PROJECT_ID
```
- Enable the required APIs:```
gcloud services enable recommender.googleapis.com
``
